name: regex_for_bas_3
content:
00:18, Mar 18 - Jannet created group “D&D Pathfinder campaign🎋”
00:18, Mar 18 - Jannet added you
00:19, Mar 18 - Glenn/Jezus: is -432 Stefan?
00:19, Mar 18 - Jannet : Si
00:20, Mar 18 - Jannet фывфы: Had je al een campaign klaar liggen?
00:20, Mar 18 - Glenn/Jezus changed this group's icon
00:21, Mar 18 - Glenn/Jezus: Lex had one lying around, I'd just need to convert the encounters
00:23, Mar 18 - Glenn/Jezus: Though I also have this short adventure I did with some other guys
00:42, Mar 18 - Glenn/Jezus: Either way, All your player resources can be found at d20pfsrd.com
author: Roman
